name: Oceania
declaringWar: You have committed the greatest of crimes: disloyalty. Prepare to be erased from history.
attacked: Oceania is eternal. All memory of your resistance will be... erased.
defeated: Temporary setbacks are irrelevant, the Party will rise again.
hateHello: We know what you are. History will not remember your defiance.
tradeRequest: May I interest you in an exchange of goods?.
uniqueName: War is Peace, Freedom is Slavery, Ignorence is Strength
uniques: Comment [Halves some of the effects of unhappiness when at war]
[-1] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
[+37]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-1] Happiness> <when at war> <hidden from users>
[+25]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness> <when at war> <hidden from users>
[+16]% Strength <for [All] units> <when below [-10] Happiness> <when at war> <hidden from users>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>

name: Eastasia
declaringWar: It has become apparent you refuse to accept the truth, now we must force you to realize it.
attacked: You still hold on to the belief that your past sins are forgiven?
We have always been at war, I just gave you the mercy of a first strike.
defeated: The Obliteration of Self isn't just a thought, it's a truth. While you crumble from within, Eastasia will endure...
introduction: You will soon come to learn the Four Truths...
neutralHello: In this life, you will learn the truth.
hateHello: You continue to suffer, not because you're special, but because you refuse to accept forgiveness...
tradeRequest: This may help in your journey to seek the redemption for your past sins.
uniques: [+15]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when not at war>

name: Eurasia
declaringWar: The State is free, the State is equal, you are not. You are... to be extinguished... forever.
attacked: Your so called "resistance" is irrelevant, prepare for the full might of Eurasia.
defeated: It is without doubt, the State will rise again, and you will fall, be forgotten, you... are nothing.
tradeRequest: For your people, as they need help from imperialists like you.
uniques: Quantity of strategic resources produced by the empire +[10]%
